{!Community_Url}

Please note that you have not been subscribed to any email lists, and the details provided by you are only being used to send password reset communication. This email was sent by Otsuka Patient Assistance Foundation, Inc. (OPAF). OPAF holds patient privacy in the highest regard and is committed to protecting the patient’s confidential information. Therefore, we cannot email patient-identifiable and confidential information to you because we cannot assure the security of information sent via email. However, if you have any questions, please contact OPAF at 1-855-727-6274. Please do not reply to this email, as it was sent from an unmonitored email address, and we cannot reply to inquiries.
